titles.title: A resolution supporting the designation of October 8, 2016, as "40 Years of Women Cadets at the United States Air Force Academy Day".
A resolution supporting the designation of October 8, 2016, as "40 Years of Women Cadets at the United States Air Force Academy Day".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Armed Services.
Senate Committee on Armed Services discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Expresses support for the designation of October 8, 2016, as 40 Years of Women Cadets at the United States Air Force Academy Day.
Commends the service and accomplishments of the women cadets and graduates of the U.S. Air Force Academy in Colorado Springs, Colorado.
Honors women who serve in the Air Force.
